title: Kava: Calming the Storm — Traditional vs. Modern Use
description: Comparing noble kava chemotypes, safety data, and preparation differences.
excerpt: Comparing noble kava chemotypes, safety data, and preparation differences.
html:
Kava (Piper methysticum) has a long history across the South Pacific.

Its kavalactones interact with GABAergic systems, producing calm without sedation.
bodyHtml:
Kava (Piper methysticum) has a long history across the South Pacific.

Its kavalactones interact with GABAergic systems, producing calm without sedation.
